topics.body:
So I'm completely dead.  We just rushed in emptying our storage unit that was packed to the ceiling and door before it closed so we could label all of our boxes before the movers arrive... in 4 more days.  Not sure what my folks were thinking when they decided we'd do all that today - probably that it would take longer than it did - but now I am sooooooooooo goosh durn dead tired.
And I still have the rest of this week of things like this (though at least it will just be in our house and not carting things around in several car trips)
And then we have a 3-week-long road trip deal thingy because the new house we bought won't actually let us move in for 3 more weeks, so I'll probably be dead tired throughout all of that time, too.

I say all of this to just let everyone know, that if I'm short or rude with anyone during this time, I am sorry and I probably won't really think you're some kind of moron who has no bearing on whatever it is I might be irked about in the future.
topics.author: 4fde0c7e945b706cc30003eb
